meanings.definition: Formed an idea or concept of something.
meanings.sent1: She conceptualized a plan to redecorate her room.
meanings.sent2: He conceptualized a new invention that could help people.
meanings.sent3: The students conceptualized a fun way to remember their multiplication tables.
meanings.sent4: The artist conceptualized a masterpiece in his mind before putting it on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The chef conceptualized a unique dish that combined flavors in a surprising way.

meanings.definition: Understood or interpreted something in a conceptual way.
meanings.sent1: The scientist conceptualized the complex theory after years of research.
meanings.sent2: She conceptualized the abstract painting and found deep meaning in its colors.
meanings.sent3: The children conceptualized the idea of time travel and imagined exciting adventures.
meanings.sent4: He conceptualized the world as a giant puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The author conceptualized a futuristic society where robots lived among humans.
